Mysore.title: Royal Heritage & Adventure in Mysore
Mysore.description: Experience the royal grandeur of Mysore combined with thrilling adventures in nearby Coorg. This itinerary blends cultural exploration with adrenaline-pumping activities.

itinerary.title: Royal Palace & Heritage Walk
activities: Start early with a guided heritage walk around the magnificent Mysore Palace
Explore the intricate architecture and royal artifacts
Visit Chamundi Hills and climb the 1,000 steps to Chamundeshwari Temple
Evening boat ride at the serene Karanji Lake with bird watching
Night illumination of Mysore Palace (weekends and festivals)

itinerary.title: Adventure Day in Coorg
activities: Early morning drive to Coorg (3 hours)
White water rafting on the thrilling Barapole River
Rock climbing and rappelling at Mandalpatti
Stay overnight in a coffee estate

itinerary.title: Nature & Local Culture
activities: Trek to Abbey Falls and enjoy the cascading waters
Visit local coffee plantations and learn about coffee processing
Return to Mysore and explore Devaraja Market

Jaipur.title: Royal Rajasthan Adventure
Jaipur.description: Soar above the Pink City in hot air balloons, explore majestic forts, and experience desert adventures that will leave you breathless.

itinerary.title: Sky High Royal Experience
activities: Pre-dawn hot air balloon ride over Amer Fort at sunrise
Champagne breakfast in the sky with panoramic city views
Explore the magnificent Amer Fort and its mirror palace
Elephant ride up to the fort entrance
Evening at Nahargarh Fort for sunset views

itinerary.title: City Palace & Local Bazaars
activities: Guided tour of City Palace and its museums
Shopping spree at Johari Bazaar and Bapu Bazaar
Traditional Rajasthani lunch at a heritage hotel
Evening cultural show with folk dance and music

itinerary.title: Desert Adventure Day
activities: ATV rides through desert terrain near Pushkar
Camel safari in the Thar Desert outskirts
Desert camping with bonfire and stargazing
Traditional Rajasthani dinner under the stars

itinerary.title: Extreme Adventures
activities: Bungee jumping at Rishikesh-style adventure park
Rock climbing at natural rock formations
Farewell dinner at a rooftop restaurant

Saputara.title: Hill Station Serenity & Forest Adventures
Saputara.description: Gujarat's only hill station offers peaceful lake experiences combined with thrilling forest adventures and artistic cultural immersion.

itinerary.title: Lake Serenity & Sunset Magic
activities: Morning boat ride on the pristine Saputara Lake
Visit to the tribal museum and learn local culture
Trek to Sunset Point for breathtaking valley views
Explore Artist Village and interact with local artisans
Evening ropeway ride for panoramic hill views

itinerary.title: Forest Adventure in Waghai
activities: Early morning drive to nearby Waghai forests
River crossing and rope bridge challenges

itinerary.title: Cultural & Nature Immersion
activities: Tribal dance performance and local handicraft shopping
Boating and paddle sports on the lake
Farewell dinner with local Gujarati cuisine

Varanasi.title: Spiritual Awakening & Aerial Adventures
Varanasi.description: Experience the spiritual heart of India with sacred Ganges rituals, ancient temples, and surprising aerial adventures in nearby regions.

itinerary.title: Sacred Ganges Experience
activities: Pre-dawn boat ride on the holy Ganges River
Witness sunrise from the ghats with morning prayers
Yoga and meditation session by the riverside
Explore the narrow lanes and ancient temples
Evening Ganga Aarti ceremony at Dashashwamedh Ghat

itinerary.title: Buddhist Heritage & Culture
activities: Day trip to Sarnath - birthplace of Buddhism
Visit Dhamek Stupa and archaeological museum

itinerary.title: Adventure & Aerial Thrills
activities: Drive to Ghazipur for paragliding adventures
Soar above the Ganges plains with bird's eye views
River rafting on calmer sections of the Ganges
Visit to local villages and rural experiences

itinerary.title: Final Blessings & Departure
activities: Morning temple visits and final prayers
Shopping for silk sarees and spiritual artifacts
Last boat ride with flower offerings to Ganga

Rishikesh.title: Adventure Capital of India
Rishikesh.description: The ultimate adventure destination combining spiritual experiences with world-class extreme sports and white water thrills.

itinerary.title: Extreme Heights & Spiritual Depths
activities: Morning bungee jump at Jumpin Heights (India's highest)
Giant swing and flying fox experiences
Afternoon visit to Beatles Ashram ruins
Evening Ganga Aarti at Triveni Ghat

itinerary.title: White Water Rafting Adventure
activities: Full day white water rafting from Shivpuri to Rishikesh
Navigate through Grade III and IV rapids
Cliff jumping and body surfing in calm pools

itinerary.title: Aerial & Rock Adventures
activities: Rock climbing at natural cliff faces

itinerary.title: Spiritual & Cultural Immersion
activities: Early morning yoga class with Himalayan views
Visit to ancient temples and ashrams
Local market exploration and souvenir shopping

Goa.title: Beach Paradise & Water Sports Extravaganza
Goa.description: Perfect blend of Portuguese heritage, pristine beaches, and thrilling water sports with extreme adventure activities.

itinerary.title: Surf & Heritage
activities: Morning surf lessons at Ashwem Beach
Explore Chapora Fort and its panoramic views
Visit to Se Cathedral and Basilica of Bom Jesus
Sunset at Anjuna Beach with flea market shopping
Beach shack dinner with live music

itinerary.title: Water Sports Bonanza
activities: Jet skiing and banana boat rides

itinerary.title: Extreme Adventures
activities: Bungee jumping at North Goa adventure park

itinerary.title: Cultural & Culinary Journey
activities: Spice plantation tour with traditional lunch
Visit to local markets and cashew factories
Farewell beach party with live DJ

Matheran.title: Vehicle-Free Hill Station Adventures
Matheran.description: Asia's only vehicle-free hill station offering pristine nature, valley views, and unique eco-friendly adventure experiences.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Valley Exploration
activities: Toy train journey from Neral to Matheran
Trek to Panorama Point for 360-degree valley views
Visit Charlotte Lake and surrounding nature

itinerary.title: Adventure & Thrills
activities: Zip-lining across valleys at Echo Point
Rock climbing at natural cliff faces
Evening bonfire with local folk music

itinerary.title: Nature Immersion & Departure
activities: Visit to Louisa Point and Hart Point
Departure via scenic toy train journey

Leh-Ladakh.title: High Altitude Adventure Paradise
Leh-Ladakh.description: Ultimate high-altitude adventure combining motorcycle expeditions, extreme sports, and breathtaking Himalayan landscapes.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization & Local Exploration
activities: Arrival and rest for altitude acclimatization
Visit Leh Palace and Shanti Stupa

itinerary.title: Khardung La Pass Adventure
activities: Motorcycle ride to world's highest motorable pass
Camel safari on sand dunes at Hunder

itinerary.title: White Water Rafting
activities: White water rafting on Zanskar River

itinerary.title: Pangong Lake Expedition
activities: Early morning drive to Pangong Tso
Photography at the changing colors lake

Leh-Ladakh.bestTime: May to September (Summer), December to February (Winter Sports)

Agra.title: Mughal Heritage & Rural Adventures
Agra.description: Experience the iconic Taj Mahal combined with thrilling rural adventures and wildlife safaris in the Chambal region.

itinerary.title: Taj Mahal & Mughal Monuments
activities: Pre-dawn arrival for Taj Mahal sunrise
Explore Agra Fort and its palaces
Visit Mehtab Bagh for sunset Taj views

itinerary.title: Chambal Safari Adventure
activities: River safari spotting gharials and dolphins

Alleppey.title: Backwater Paradise & Coastal Adventures
Alleppey.description: Cruise through Kerala's famous backwaters while enjoying water sports, village experiences, and coastal adventures.

itinerary.title: Houseboat Cruise Experience
activities: Overnight on houseboat with traditional meals

itinerary.title: Kayaking & Village Life
activities: Coconut farm tours and toddy tasting

Darjeeling.title: Himalayan Tea Gardens & High Altitude Thrills
Darjeeling.description: Experience the charm of hill stations with tea gardens, toy trains, and exciting high-altitude adventure sports.

itinerary.title: Toy Train & Tea Gardens
activities: Visit to Happy Valley Tea Estate
Evening at Mall Road with mountain views

itinerary.title: Tiger Hill Sunrise & Adventure
activities: Pre-dawn trek to Tiger Hill for Kanchenjunga sunrise

itinerary.title: River Rafting & Nature
activities: White water rafting on Teesta River
Visit to Padmaja Naidu Himalayan Zoological Park

itinerary.title: Cultural Immersion & Departure
activities: Visit to Tibetan Refugee Self Help Centre
Final tea garden visit and photography

Darjeeling.bestTime: March to May, September to November

Junagadh.title: Spiritual Peaks & Wildlife Safari
Junagadh.description: Combine spiritual mountain climbing with wildlife encounters and adventure sports in Gujarat's historic region.

itinerary.title: Girnar Hills Spiritual Trek
activities: Early morning start for Girnar Hills trek
Visit ancient Jain and Hindu temples

itinerary.title: Gir National Park Safari
activities: Early morning wildlife safari in Gir

itinerary.title: Adventure & History
activities: Rock climbing at natural cliff faces
Explore Uparkot Fort and its stepwells

Ahmedabad.title: Heritage City & Modern Adventures
Ahmedabad.description: Explore UNESCO World Heritage sites combined with modern adventure parks and thrilling activities.

itinerary.title: Heritage Walk & Culture
activities: Guided heritage walk through old city pols
Visit Sabarmati Ashram and Gandhi's legacy
Explore Jama Masjid and Sidi Saiyyed Mosque
Traditional Gujarati lunch in heritage hotel

itinerary.title: Nature & Wildlife
activities: Cycling tours through city heritage sites

itinerary.title: Modern City & Departure
activities: Visit to Science City and interactive exhibits
Shopping at Law Garden night market

Udaipur.title: City of Lakes & Royal Adventures
Udaipur.description: Experience royal heritage with lake adventures, palace explorations, and thrilling outdoor activities in the Aravalli hills.

itinerary.title: Lake Palace & City Exploration
activities: Sunrise boat ride on Lake Pichola
Explore Jagdish Temple and local markets
Traditional Rajasthani dinner with cultural show

itinerary.title: Adventure in Aravalli Hills
activities: Visit to Monsoon Palace for panoramic views

itinerary.title: Water Sports & Island Hopping
activities: Visit to Jag Mandir island palace

itinerary.title: Rural Adventures & Culture
activities: Village safari to experience rural Rajasthan

itinerary.title: Final Royal Experience
activities: Heritage hotel breakfast with lake views
Final shopping at Hathi Pol bazaar

Dharoi.title: Dam Views & Forest Adventures
Dharoi.description: Peaceful dam-side experiences combined with forest adventures and nearby hill station thrills at Mount Abu.

itinerary.title: Dharoi Dam & Nature
activities: Morning visit to Dharoi Dam and reservoir
Picnic by the water with scenic views

itinerary.title: Polo Forest Adventure
activities: Rock climbing at natural cliff faces

itinerary.title: Mount Abu Hill Station
activities: Day trip to Mount Abu hill station
